channel.title: Help?!
channel.description:
Hi, you may think I am a total noob when I ask you thies questions (because I am) but I need anyone to answer some questions I have, it should b easy for you guys :). And plz add a tut uf you can....
question 1. Whats a router? lol 2.Whats an IP adress? 3.whats the difference between an internet IP address and a computer/gateway IP address??? 4.Do i have to make a working server with a client that connects to Mopar somehow or does it not? 5.How do I see my IP adress? 6.how do I see my gateway IP adress? 7.Is there any way I can get my own client? 8.Is there a difference between a source and a client?
And that's it, You don't have to answer all of the questions just some at a time And plz try to hurry lol
Thanks. ;D

item.title: Help?!
item.dc:creator: @Eportal Eportal
item.description:
@Eportal wrote:

Wow thanks a lot! You helped me a ton!

item.title: Help?!
item.dc:creator: @jehanne jehanne
item.description:
@jehanne wrote:

  1. when u have multiple computers in your house most ppl hav a router, it splits up the cable in more connections(so u can put more comps on internet) maybe u dont even hav a router, as sumone in yous house(they can explain better )
  2. computer/gateway adress is internal, internet extern
    3&4. client that connects to mopar?ther is no such thing as a moparscape server, you have to make it connect to myour server(simply put the ip in the box, lol)
  3. start->run->type cmd, press enter->type ipconfig/all and press enter
  4. see 5
  5. yup. look in pirvate server hacking section
  6. yup. the source is the server itself, and u can use a client to connect to it.

Read full topic
